mainfeatures: 5.0 Mega-pixel CMOS sensor Dynamic imaging FHD 1080P (30 fps) 3.0 Inch touch LCD display (16:9) Optical zoom 23x, digital zoom 120x AV Output HDMI , NTSC/PAL Built-in 128MB flash memory SDHC Card (Up to 64GB Class 6) CB-170 (1700mAh) Li-ion battery
specifications: Sensor CMOS 5.0 Mega-Pixel Sensor Dynamic imaging FHD: 1080p (30 fps) HD+: 720p (60 fps) HD: 720p (30 fps) VGA: 640 X 480 (30fps) Static image high: 4608x3456 (16MP) Standard: 2592x1544 (5MP) Low: 2048x1536 (3MP) LCD Display: 3.0inch Touch LCD display (16:9), 270 degree rotation Zoom: 23x Optical zoom,120x Digital zoom Strobe(Camera): Mode: Auto/Off/Red eye Self-Timer: 10 sec./Off ISO: Auto, 800,1600,3200,6400 TV-Out: NTSC/PAL/HDMI AV output HDMI , NTSC/PAL Document form static image: JPG; Dynamic imaging:MP4 (H.264) Storage Media: Built-in 128MB flash memory Memory Card Slot: SDHC Card (Up to 64GB Class 6) Dimension: 126 x 57 x 60mm Battery: CB-170 (1700mAh) Li-ion battery Lens: Auto-Focus; F3.5,f=4.0-92.0mm Focus Range: Normal: 1cm~inf, Macro: 1cm~120cm Image Resolution: 16M (interpolation), 5M, 3M OSD languages: English / Simplified Chinese / Traditional Chinese / Korean / German / Italian / French / Spanish / Portuguese / Japanese
packagecontents: 1 x Digital camcorder HD-230Z 1 x Li-ion battery 1 x USB cable 1 x AV cable 1 x HDMI cable 1 x Software CD 1 x Camera pouch 1 x English user manual
